feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-12T00:35:47.023683Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;英特尔全力支持背面供电</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/backside-power-delivery</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-11T23:35:14.567694Z</updated>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/backside-power-delivery"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/灰色块的尺寸向细水平白线方向减小，然后再次向图像顶部方向增大.jpg?id= 33959767&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;英特尔已经构建并测试了处理器内核，这些处理器内核由其当前一代的晶体管与 PowerVia 相结合，PowerVia 是一种为芯片供电的新方法，消除了硅下方的所有供电互连。由此产生的核心的频率提升超过 6%，设计更紧凑，功耗降低 30%。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intel-is-all-in-on-backside- power-delivery" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36286370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;El Paquete Semanal</stitle>; <id>;https ://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Paquete_Semanal</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T23:35:14.568614Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ El_Paquete_Semanal"/>; <author>; <name>;jrott</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrott</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;El Paquete Semanal 是一个 1 TB 的数字材料集合，在古巴的地下市场上分发，作为宽带互联网的替代品。它包含电视连续剧、肥皂剧、音乐、电影和非法分类广告，以及视频剪辑、西班牙语新闻网站、计算机技术网站、教学视频、软件和古巴当地企业的广告。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#el-paquete-semanal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36285363" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;飙升的股市由人工智能驱动</stitle>; <id>;https://www.economist.com/finance-and-economics/2023/06/07/surging-stockmarkets-are-powered -by-人工智能</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T23:35:14.569446Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.economist.com/finance-and-economics/2023/ 06/07/surging-stockmarkets-are-powered-by-artificial-intelligence"/>; <author>; <name>;axiomdata316</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=axiomdata316< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.economist.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=1424,quality=80,format=auto/media- assets/image/20230610_FND001.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;股票市场的飙升，尤其是科技公司的飙升，归因于对人工智能的兴奋。分析师估计，73% 的市场反弹可以用 14 家公司对 AI 的大量曝光来解释，包括英伟达、谷歌和微软。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#surging-stockmarkets-are-powered-by-artificial-intelligence" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36286513" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Linux 6.5 将支持 MIDI 2.0 驱动程序</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phoronix.com/news/MIDI-2.0-Support-Linux- 6.5</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T23:35:14.570186Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.phoronix.com/news/MIDI-2.0-Support-Linux-6.5"/ >; <author>; <name>;rcarmo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/multimedia.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Linux 6.5 将包括对 USB 音频和原始 MIDI 驱动程序的 MIDI 2.0 驱动程序支持，声音子系统维护者 Takashi Iwai 添加了大约 6,000 行新代码。 MIDI 2.0 为广泛使用的音乐设备协议提供了更高的分辨率、更好的清晰度以及各种新功能和改进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#midi-2-0-driver-support-coming-with-linux-6-5" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36254672" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 ImageEngine 上针对 AVIF 测试的 JPEG XL</stitle>; <id>;https://mastodon.online/@jonarnes/110514451857948151</id >; <updated>;2023-06-11T17:35:14.571009Z</updated>; <link href="https://mastodon.online/@jonarnes/110514451857948151"/>; <author>; <name>;ksec</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ksec</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://files.mastodon.online/media_attachments/文件/110/514/449/182/998/022/original/c48e114fc520cc11.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;根据在 ImageEngine 上进行的初步测试，JPEG XL 在文件大小减小和视觉质量方面优于 AVIF。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jpeg-xl-against-avif-tested-on-imageengine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36283395" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从栈到树：Rust 的新别名模型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ralfj.de/blog/2023/06/02 /tree-borrows.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T19:35:14.572031Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.ralfj.de/blog/2023/06/02/ tree-borrows.html"/>; <author>; <name>;obl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=obl</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;Neven 正在为 Rust 开发一个名为 Tree Borrows 的新别名模型，旨在解决当前模型 Stacked Borrows 的问题，并为两阶段借用提供适当的支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#from-stacks-to-trees-a-new-aliasing-model-for-rust" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一个人完成青少年 Commodore 64 RPG 的 8 位任务</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gaming /2023/06/one-mans-40-year-8-bit-quest-to-finish-the-c64-rpg-he-started-in-1984/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T17： 35:14.572793Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2023/06/one-mans-40-year-8-bit-quest-to-finish-the-c64-rpg -he-started-in-1984/"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Screenshot-2023-06-09-at-10.50.04-AM-800x382。 png" style="宽度：220px；高度：106px；" />;<br />;Mike Brixius 一直致力于完成他自己的 1984 年 Commodore 64 CRPG，他已经为此工作了将近 40 年。他希望他的 Patreon 支持者和 YouTube 社区能够给予他“道义上的支持和责任感”，让他在这些年后完成自己的比赛。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#one-mans-8-bit-quest-to-finish-his-teenage-commodore-64-rpg" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36283003" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;无结构暴政 (1970)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jofreeman.com/joreen /tyranny.htm</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T20:35:14.573475Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.jofreeman.com/joreen/tyranny.htm"/>; <author >; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了“无结构”在妇女解放运动中，并认为不可能有一个真正无结构的团体。作者认为，将一个群体的结构正式化可以防止非正式结构和群体内部精英的形成。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-tyranny-of-structurelessness-1970" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36285097" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;荷兰政府希望自动获得针对黑客受害者的许可</stitle>; <id>;https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/dutch-intel-law-about-intel /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T14:35:14.574070Z</updated>; <link href="https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/dutch-intel-law-about-intel/" />; <author>; <name>;croes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=croes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://berthub.eu/articles/logo3.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：207px；" />;<br />;荷兰政府正在提议一项新法律，自动将逮捕令扩展到黑客攻击受害者，允许情报和安全部门在未经进一步批准的情况下拦截他们的通信或入侵他们。这一增加显着改变了许多权力的范围，也扩大了它们的适用范围，在这些新权力中造成了紧张。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-dutch-government-wants-automatic-permission-to-target-victims-of-hackers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36281543" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Treebomination：将 scikit-learn 决策树转换为 Keras 模型</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com /Dobiasd/treebomination</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T21:35:14.574594Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Dobiasd/treebomination"/>; <作者>; <名称>; Dobiasd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Dobiasd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw. githubusercontent.com/Dobiasd/treebomination/main/treebomination.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Treebomination 是一种将 scikit-learn 决策树转换为 Keras 模型的工具，它通过用两个神经元模拟每个决策节点并初始化权重和偏差以输出与树相似的结果。生成的神经网络具有与原始树相似的精度，但预测时间更快。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#treebomination-convert-a-scikit-learn-decision-tree-into-a-keras-model" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36282748" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 罢工已经开始</stitle>; <id>;https://reddark.untone.uk/</id>; <updated >;2023-06-11T17:35:14.575113Z</updated>; <link href="https://reddark.untone.uk/"/>; <author>; <name>;Freddie111</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Freddie111</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;由于 reddit 方面的缓慢推出，一些 subreddits 可能会闪烁公开和私人，如果这正在发生，这意味着 subreddit 刚刚改变了他们的宣传类型。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-strike-has-started" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36283249" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;领域知识或缺乏知识（2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://jacquesmattheij.com/domain-knowledge-or-a-lack-thereof/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T20:35:14.575579Z</更新>; <link href="https://jacquesmattheij.com/domain-knowledge-or-a-lack-thereof/"/>; <author>; <name>; ggr2342</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ggr2342</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;缺乏领域知识是不良软件的主要原因发展。获取领域知识对于开发有效的软件至关重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#domain-knowledge-or-a-lack-thereof-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268339" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JDK 21 的“冻结”功能列表的简要概述</stitle>; <id>;https://vived.io/a-compact-overview-of-jdk -21s-frozen-feature-list-jvm-weekly-vol-138/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T15:35:14.576083Z</updated>; <link href="https://vived.io /a-compact-overview-of-jdk-21s-frozen-feature-list-jvm-weekly-vol-138/"/>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:好，fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F93757923-5d36-4e57-8d29-efaec60f6a02_1456x1048.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：159px ;" />;<br />;JDK 21 已经进入 Rampdown 阶段，其中包含一系列令人印象深刻的新功能，包括有序集合的一致接口、GC 中短期和长期对象的不同管道，以及轻松破坏记录。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-compact-overview-of-jdk-21s-frozen-feature-list" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36282076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;心理流动性</stitle>; <id>;https://collabfund.com/blog/mental-liquidity/</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-11T12:35:14.576561Z</updated>; <link href="https://collabfund.com/blog/mental-liquidity/"/>; <author>; <name>;bkohlmann</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bkohlmann</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了心理流动性的重要性，即在接受新事物时能够迅速放弃以前的信念的能力信息出现。作者强调了改变想法的困难和过分坚持信念的危险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mental-liquidity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36280772" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;为什么黑匣子飞行记录器不是更好？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.afar.com/magazine/how-black-boxes-changed-air-travel</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T11:35:14.577205Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.afar.com/magazine/how-black-boxes-changed-air-travel"/>; <作者>; <名称>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /afar.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/bd882df/2147483647/strip/true/crop/1920x1080+0+0/resize/400x225!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fafar-media-production -web.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fbrightspot%2F25%2F66%2F3e0cc8cb4ccb9f73c4c0a7dc7f6a%2Fafar-logo.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了 2009 年坠毁的法航 447 航班黑匣子的回收情况，以及黑匣子中的数据如何揭示导致致命坠机的一系列事故。它还探讨了黑匣子的局限性以及对来自飞机的实时数据流的需求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-aren-t-black-box-flight-recorders-better" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280091" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Csexp：网络上的 S-Expressions</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.racket-lang.org/csexp/index.html< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T16:35:14.577836Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.racket-lang.org/csexp/index.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thefilmore</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thefilmore</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;规范 s 表达式 (csexp) 是一种方式将 s-expressions 格式化为适合在网络上传输的数据包。这使得读取流中的表达式变得容易，并提供了一种编写给定 s 表达式的独特（规范）方式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#csexp-s-expressions-over-the-network" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36282798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;公司简史：1600 年至 2100 年（2011 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ribbonfarm.com/2011/06/08/a -brief-history-of-the-corporation-1600-to-2100/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T18:35:14.578306Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.ribbonfarm .com/2011/06/08/a-brief-history-of-the-corporation-1600-to-2100/"/>; <author>; <name>;simonpure</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=simonpure</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ribbonfarm.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/ fourForces.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：161px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了公司的历史，从 1772 年随着英国东印度公司崛起到 21 世纪的最终衰落。作者认为，虽然公司取得了令人难以置信的成就，但它们最终会过时，并被后公司的未来所取代。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-brief-history-of-the-corporation-1600-to-2100-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36283638" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;代码和编程项目</stitle>; <id>;https://www.chrisgregory.me/code</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-11T22:35:14.578765Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.chrisgregory.me/code"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/cgme/icons/logo/cg -block-large.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;个人在线作品集<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#code-and-programming-projects" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36286058" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;可扩展技术的诅咒</stitle>; <id>;https://lukeplant.me.uk/blog/posts/the-curse-of-可扩展技术/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T18:35:14.579260Z</更新>; <link href="https://lukeplant.me.uk/blog/posts/the-curse-of-可扩展技术/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;软件开发中工具的可扩展性和实用性广度可能会导致诸如无休止的争论、复制不适当的解决方案以及项目偏离轨道等问题。不同的环境，例如组织规模和类型、市场变化速度和用户能力，都会极大地影响技术决策。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curse-of-scalable-technology" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36273917" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Writesonic (YC S21) 正在招聘数字营销经理</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/writesonic/jobs/PL99uk8-digital-marketing -经理</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T17:35:14.579907Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/writesonic/jobs/PL99uk8-digital-marketing-经理”/>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/5c3627a012cbd2927f9d0157663c3668b458fe3e.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Writesonic 是领先的生成式 AI 平台，拥有超过 500 万用户，彻底改变了内容创作并改变了企业和个人的沟通方式。我们的尖端技术使用户能够轻松创建高质量的原创内容。我们是一家快速发展的创新型公司，正在寻找有才华的人加入我们的团队。我们正在寻找一位实践经验丰富的增长营销经理加入我们的团队。在此职位上，您将领导我们跨多个渠道的营销工作，专注于推动增长和增加收入。您应该具有在 SaaS 环境中制定、执行和优化数字营销活动的经验。制定并实施全面的营销策略，包括搜索引擎优化、付费广告、电子邮件营销、影响者外展、合作伙伴关系、播客等。分析活动绩效和用户参与度以优化活动、进行必要的调整并报告 ROI。紧跟数字营销和 SaaS 行业的最新趋势和变化，并根据需要调整我们的策略。与其他团队成员和部门合作，使我们的营销策略与我们的产品供应和公司总体目标保持一致。 3-5 年增长营销角色的实践经验，最好是在 SaaS 环境中。具有技术背景，能够清楚地理解和解释我们的产品及其优势。 Writesonic 正在构建未来的内容营销平台，以帮助企业使用 AI 编写更好的营销文案。这就像您口袋里有一个撰稿人，随时准备为您提供所需的任何类型的内容 - 从 Facebook 和 Google 广告到登陆页面、产品描述、博客文章、摘要等等。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#writesonic-yc-s21-is-hiring-a-digital-marketing-manager" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;交接浪费和泰勒主义</stitle>; <id>;https:// two-wrongs.com/handoff-waste-and-taylorism.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T17:35:14.580320Z</更新>; <link href="https://two-wrongs.com /handoff-waste-and-taylorism.html"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了产品开发组织中交接浪费的概念，这是由泰勒主义或“科学管理”的实践造成的。这种浪费可以通过将责任、知识、行动和反馈这四个职能集中在一个人身上来最小化，这个人被称为总工程师或企业家系统设计师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#handoff-waste-and-taylorism" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36275237" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;显示 HN：OpenObserve – Elasticsearch/Datadog 替代品</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/openobserve/openobserve</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T13:35 :14.580789Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/openobserve/openobserve"/>; <author>; <name>;prabhatsharma</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=prabhatsharma</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openobserve/openobserve/main/screenshots/zo_intro_youtube.png" 风格= “宽度：220px；高度：128px；” />;<br />;OpenObserve 是一个云原生可观察性平台，专为日志、指标、跟踪和分析而设计，与 Elasticsearch/Splunk/Datadog 相比，它提供高性能、PB 规模和更低的存储成本。它易于操作，可以用作 Elasticsearch 的直接替代品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-openobserve-elasticsearch-datadog-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280028" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;这是有效的 Python 语法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitecode.dev/p/this-is-valid-python-syntax</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T11:35:14.581254Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bitecode.dev/p/this-is-valid-python-syntax"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ankitg12</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ankitg12</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffe596e59-4010-422a- b4f7-df7531fd4eca_948x948.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了 Python 语法的各种特性，包括在数字文字、f 字符串、解包和 splat 运算符中使用下划线。它还探讨了如何组合这些功能来创建复杂而神秘的代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#this-is-valid-python-syntax" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36280214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;GrayC：C 编译器和分析器的 Greybox 模糊测试 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://srg.doc.ic.ac.uk/files/papers/grayc -issta-23.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T18:35:14.581708Z</更新>; <link href="https://srg.doc.ic.ac.uk/files/papers/ grayc-issta-23.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;这篇文章提出了一种用于模糊 C 编译器和代码分析器的覆盖导向、基于突变的方法，称为 GrayC，它针对常见的 C 构造并转换模糊程序以产生有意义的输出。 GrayC 已经确定了 30 个已确认的编译器和代码分析器错误，包括 25 个以前未知的错误。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#grayc-greybox-fuzzing-of-compilers-and-analysers-for-c-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36284172" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;她量天画地</stitle>; <id>;https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/she- measures-heavens-and-outlines-earth</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T22:35:14.582197Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/she-measures -heavens-and-outlines-earth"/>; <author>; <name>;diodorus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=diodorus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/ypm_8cf7a4e8-476f-44ab-b731-8e721f80f3a0.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：294px； “ />;<br />;作为 2300 年左右苏美尔城市乌尔月神的高级女祭司，Enheduanna 是一长串仰望夜空寻求神圣指引的官员。附近城市乌鲁克的祭司可能是第一个将一年分为十二个阴历月的人，那里早在一千年前就发明了文字。在西方地平线上第一次看到细长的新月标志着一个月的开始，它的消失标志着结束。乌尔是位于今天伊拉克南部肥沃新月最南端的几十个讲苏美尔语的城市之一。这些是世界上最早的城市，建造得如此雄伟，以至于最早的创世神话表明最初的伊甸园不是花园——它是苏美尔人的城市，旨在让众神安顿在“他们心中喜悦的居所”。阴历帮助寺庙官员管理这些城市：通过一致的计时来稳定的食物配给、有序的档案和适时的祭祀节日。对于农民来说，某些星星的升起标志着收获的开始，那时他们会耕种大麦田，并将一筐筐的谷物送到寺庙的仓库。但是 Enheduanna 不仅仅通过观察天空来确定何时开始新的一个月。她在圣殿山顶上唱的赞美诗与世世代代演奏的无名虔诚歌曲不同。她是世界上最早为人所知的作家，也是第一个在文学作品中出现自己的人。 “我是 Enheduanna，”她在两首赞美诗中间题词。 “我还是那个风华绝代的大祭司！”历史上第一次，一位作家不仅用诗歌赞美神灵，还分享自己生活中的细节。在一些自传体的诗句中，她讲述了被一个篡夺王位的人赶出月神神殿的故事。 “我像燕子一样飞出窗户逃走了，”她写道。 “他夺走了我的女祭司王冠。”女神伊南娜，月神叛逆的女儿，最终救了她。 “可爱的天堂女士，”她这样称呼她。 “女王骑着狮子。”除了这个危机时刻，人们对 Enheduanna 知之甚少。她是阿卡德国王萨尔贡大帝的女儿，萨尔贡大帝建立了历史上第一个帝国——阿卡德帝国。到 2334 年，萨尔贡率领五千多名军队从他的北方首都阿加德出发，征服了苏美尔城市，摧毁了它们高耸的砖墙，并任命恩赫杜安娜掌舵乌尔的月神神庙。在 Enheduanna 唯一幸存的肖像（费城宾夕法尼亚博物馆收藏的用雪花石膏雕刻的月亮形浮雕）上的铭文中，她将自己标识为月神的母鸡，这个头衔指的是她作为月神妻子的仪式角色.除了主持太阴祭祀之外，这个职位的具体细节在很大程度上是未知的。几位历史学家认为 Enheduanna 是她那个时代最著名的女性，而其他人则声称她无关紧要。有些人认为她的画像和高贵的鹰钩鼻代表了她的外貌，而另一些人则坚持认为这与她的外貌无关。历史学家马克·范·德·米罗普 (Marc Van de Mieroop) 将古代近东历史领域描述为“一间黑暗的房间，有孤立的光点，根据资料来源，有些光点比其他光点更亮”，Enheduanna 也是如此。 The most important sources for understanding her life and legacy are her dozens of surviving poems, which interweave local religious traditions across her father's empire into a cohesive theology and proclaim the goddess Inanna to be the most powerful deity in the pantheon. Inanna was the personified form of the planet Venus, which at the time was still known as the morning star and evening star, likely because the planet was visible just before dawn and after dusk. “Good woman, inscrutable and radiant,” Enheduanna writes. “Your rule extends from zenith to horizon.” Her poems are the earliest known texts about Inanna, and she appears to ground the deity's signature duality—“to destroy and to create, to plant and to pluck out are yours, Inanna”—in her celestial properties, the way Venus always hovers on a threshold. Enheduanna also emphasizes Inanna's unpredictability—“nobody can know her course”—a characteristic perhaps informed by the way the morning star and evening star disappear for months at a time, blotted out by the sun and moon. What is clear, if little else is clear about Enheduanna's life, is that when she flung back her neck to observe the heavens, she was searching for Inanna. Enheduanna's longest and most well-known hymns tell the story of how the goddess, “born to be a second-rate ruler,” rose to become even more powerful than her father, the Moon. It's tempting to imagine she was also hoping to see herself reflected in Inanna's unlikely ascendence. While the moon is the brightest force in the night sky, Enheduanna's father Sargon the Great was the most powerful man on earth—“King of the World,” he claimed in his royal inscriptions. Enheduanna herself became one of the most canonical poets of Mesopotamia, her work copied by scribes across the region for nearly a millennium. Historians date the earliest astronomical texts to over six centuries after Enheduanna's death, to the reign of a Babylonian king named Ammisaduqa. As historian Francesca Rochberg argues in her 2004 book Heavenly Writing, the systematic study of celestial phenomena arose “in a context of state-sponsored divination,” where happenings in the heavens were viewed as “portents” for kings. Employed by Ammisaduqa, the first known astronomers tracked the appearance of Venus every night for twenty-one years, and devised omens meant to guide the king's military, diplomatic, and economic decisions. Here is an example of one of their omens, which were always posed as conditional statements: “If on the fifteenth of Month XI Venus disappeared in the west, remained invisible three days, and reappeared in the east on the eighteenth day of Month XI, then catastrophes of kings. Adad will bring rains, Ea will bring floods, one king will send greetings to another king.” Historians of the period have argued that these astronomical practices, where patterns in the sky were used to predict events on earth, evolved from earlier Sumerian traditions whose records were either lost or never written down. Enheduanna's poems are not nearly as detailed as these later omens, but her verses similarly reflect an attempt to capture the night sky and make sense of its inscrutable forms. Just as the later astronomers tracked Venus, Enheduanna tries to capture Inanna's astral manifestation, admiring the way she “brings beauty to the firmament at dusk.” If the first astronomers tracked patterns in the sky to predict events on earth, Enheduanna seems more interested in drawing parallels between heaven and earth. Her celestial imagery casts the unknowable realm of the sky into a familiar terrain, populated by charming images. She describes the Moon as the one who “steps forth on the night sky that glitters like lapis lazuli,” evoking the idea, echoed in later poetry, that the sky was a giant lapis lazuli tablet, its constellations like the flecks of gold on that valuable stone. She also compares the moon's crescent to the crown of the region's most sacred animal: “You raise your horns as if you were a bull.” The sun's light is like facial hair, sweeping over the land: “In the soaring daylight, a beard hangs from his chin.” As the Assyriologist Thorkild Jacobsen argues in his 1978 book Treasures of Darkness, figurative language is the means by which experiences of the divine are communicated, and “religious content and forms are handed down from one generation to the next.” Enheduanna's poetry reverberates across the written tradition, likely influencing texts that informed the Old Testament—and yet almost nothing has been written about her possible contributions to the field of astronomy. Many of Enheduanna's images are echoed in later celestial records, suggesting that her verses could have informed how astronomers conceived of the heavens. The Sun God's beard became a way to express the brightness of planets; the “beard” of Venus was often invoked to capture its overwhelming gleam. The logic of celestial omens—if X in heaven, then Y on earth—relies on a basic sense of parallelism: heaven and earth are cast as interconnected realms, much as they appear in Enheduanna's verses. In addition, the historical chronology makes it appear almost certain that early astronomers would have read Enheduanna's work. Babylonian diviners were trained as scribes, and Enheduanna's poems were part of their standard curriculum, called the Decad, which also included an early story about the hero Gilgamesh. Given how little we know about Enheduanna's life, and how challenging it is to trace her influence with any precision across vast periods of time, her celestial images also function as historical constants, connecting Enheduanna not just to these later astronomers, but also to today. It's possible to understand firsthand how the crescent moon does look like a pair of horns. Venus has always been the brightest object in the sky other than the moon. Enheduanna must have noticed how Venus blazed beneath her giant father in the sky—an angry, brimming thing, as she still appears today. The sky is vast and unknowable but also one of the few things that has remained mostly the same, its changes often requiring millennia to perceive. We don't have much information about the function of poetry during Enheduanna's lifetime, but writing and stargazing were deeply related pursuits. The goddess Nisaba was the deity of both scribes and stargazers, and in Sumerian, the word for star can also mean cuneiform sign. Poems were likely intoned by professional lamenters in elaborate temple performances, accompanied by bull-headed lyres with gemstone eyes played by esteemed musicians. If stargazing was an attempt to read the writing of the gods, poetry appears to have been an attempt to communicate with the divine. Enheduanna's most recent translator, Sophus Helle, describes how Sumerian poetry attempted “to change the world, by invoking the gods and enlisting their help.” Within this broader context, Enheduanna's poems are more complex than mere glimpses into the night sky, framed by evocative parallelism. What is most relevant is not what she saw—stars like cuneiform signs, the sun as a giant beard—but rather how she might have used celestial imagery to summon Inanna's attention and convince the goddess to save her. “Queen of all powers, downpour of daylight,” she begins her masterpiece. “Good woman wrapped in frightful light.” Her verses harness the sky, its power and radiance, to elevate her savior and flatter her muse. “She turns the midday heaven into a starry sky,” Enheduanna writes, suggesting that Inanna was not just a feature of the sky but the commander of its bright terrain. Like the astronomers who came later, Enheduanna could have also used her celestial imagery as an instrument of power. Her father Sargon was king, but she also lived through the reigns of her other male relatives, including her brother Rimush, known for pioneering mass executions; her other brother Manishtusu, who seized unprecedented tracks of land from the Sumerians; and her nephew Naram-sin, the first ruler to crown himself a god. These rulers credit Ishtar, the Akkadian name for Inanna, for their military successes; her cult became so central to the Akkadian empire that a later chronicler refers to their dynasty as the Reign of Ishtar. Given this broader history, it's possible Enheduanna hoped to see not only herself reflected in Inanna's rise to supremacy, but also the story of her family's triumph. Could she have seen the unprecedented victory of the Akkadian troops, who brandished shining copper weapons as they dominated Sumer? Many of her verses cast Inanna as a fearsome warrior—“let them know that you grind skulls to dust”—and over the next two thousand years, Ishtar became a figurehead of empire. King Ammisaquda's predecessor King Ammiditana left behind a hymn where he praises the goddess in language that echoes Enheduanna's work. “She grasps in her hand the destinies of all that exists.”他写。 “Who is it that could rival her grandeur?” Even if her verses served imperial ends, they still thrum with intimacy. “I will let my tears stream free to soften your heart, as if they were beer,” she writes. Enheduanna is also the attested author of forty-two shorter poems called the Temple Hymns, dedicated to various temples across the Akkadian empire. In the colophon to this collection, she writes: “My king! Something has been born which had not been born before.” Helle argues that the Temple Hymns demonstrate a kind of “hymnic imperialism,” as these poems work to unify previously disparate cults into a poetic whole. The sky must have been brimming with possible metaphors for such a project. The Temple Hymns begin near the banks of the Persian Gulf with the earliest known Sumerian cities, like Eridu, which “sprouted with heaven and earth.” Her narrative travels north toward the newer Akkadian cities. Temples dot the marshland like a constellation. “You shine with the light of righteous rule,” she writes of the Moon God's temple at Ur; while a temple in the northern city of Sippar dedicated to the Sun God is a “shining house.” In a poem that concludes the Temple Hymns, she describes the goddess Nisaba, deity of scribes and stargazers, as a “righteous woman of unmatched mind,” who “measures the heavens and outlines the earth.” And perhaps that's also how Enheduanna saw herself. This new heavenly map turns the concept of empire into something as natural and inevitable as stars in the sky. By the time the prophet Abraham was born in the city of Ur about a thousand years after Enheduanna died—five hundred years after the first astronomers tracked Venus—the Mesopotamians were renowned for their astronomical pursuits. It was the first civilization to predict eclipses, inscribe maps of the zodiac, and calculate the cycles of planets and stars. The Jewish-Roman historian Josephus claimed that Abraham himself was a famous astronomer, descended from generations of stargazers. According to Josephus, it was through Abraham's observations of the heavens that he realized there must be a god controlling the cosmos. He decided that celestial bodies must be “subservient to Him that commands them.” And thus Abraham set off for Canaan. Given Enheduanna's singular devotion to Inanna, it isn't hard to imagine her having had similar thoughts when she observed the morning star and evening star from the summit of the Moon God's temple. If Abraham was impressed by the intelligence underpinning the cosmos, Enheduanna seemed struck by the particular force of Inanna's astral form, the way she “beamed with a passionate delight, like a downpour of moonlight.” The astronomical practice Abraham left behind continued unbroken through Alexander the Great's conquest of Babylon in 331 , when Mesopotamian science rapidly spread west across the Mediterranean and east toward the Indus Valley. As Pliny the Elder wrote in the second century in a clear feat of exaggeration, “the Babylonians had astronomical observations for 730,000 years inscribed on baked bricks” and numerous Greek writers, including Aristotle, credited the Babylonians with pioneering the celestial sciences. What first becomes visible in Enheduanna's poetry—the attempt to capture the sky's ungraspable forms in language—continues, for thousands of years, and forms the foundations of astronomy, astrology, and the very deciphering of the heavens. As later generations of Mesopotamians calculate Venus' positionality with increasing accuracy, as militarized empires dominate the region, scribes and kings continue to be moved by the dualistic and flickering form of Ishtar, whose cult influenced a wide array of Venus goddesses, including the Greek deity Aphrodite. Babylonian omens associate Venus's appearance with periods of fertility and warfare, and Ishtar remains a favorite subject of literary compositions, appearing in contradictory guises as an impetuous warmonger, a young woman preparing for marriage, and a deity of lamentations, among many other manifestations. Enheduanna drew parallels between heaven and earth in her poetry, but within the larger history of astronomy, her legacy seems to run parallel to the many innovations and works of literature composed in her wake. A text attributed to the Sumerian king Gudea, who ruled just a couple centuries after her death, describes Nisaba in terms that evoke the electric sense of possibility at the heart of Enheduanna's legacy. “There was a woman—Who was she? Who was she not?”他问。 “A stylus of flaming silver she held in her hand / There was a tablet of heavenly stars on her knees, and she was consulting it.” Tatiana Hollier is a writer based in New York. She is working on a biography of Enheduanna. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#she-measures-the-heavens-and-outlines-the-earth" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;The Value of Personal Data in Internet Commerce</stitle>; <id>;https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3962157</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T23:35:14.582700Z</updated>; <link href="https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3962157"/>; <author>; <name>;severine</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=severine</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.ssrn.com/cfincludes/img/icons/icon-adobe-pdf.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 235px;" />;<br />;Personal data has become a key input in Internet Commerce, facilitating the matching between millions of customers and merchants. Recent data regulations in China, Europe and US restricts Internet platforms' ability to collect and use personal data for personalized recommendation and may fundamentally impact Internet Commerce. In collaboration with the largest E- commerce platform in China, we conduct a large-scale field experiment to measure the potential impact of data regulation policy, and to understand the value of personal data in Internet Commerce. For a random subset of 555,800 customers on Alibaba platform, we simulate the regulation by banning the use of personal data in the homepage recommendation algorithm and record the matching process and outcomes between these customers and merchants. Compared to the control group with personal data, we observe a significant higher concentration in the algorithmic recommendation of products in the treatment group and a very sharp decrease in the matching outcomes as measured by both customer engagement (clickthrough rate and product browsing) and market transaction (sales volume and amount). The negative effect is disproportionate and more pronounced for niche merchants and customers who would benefit more from E-commerce. We discuss the potential economic impact of data regulation on Internet Commerce, as well as the role of personal data in generating value and fostering long-tail innovations. Sun, Tianshu and Yuan, Zhe and Li, Chunxiao and Zhang, Kaifu and Xu, Jun, The Value of Personal Data in Internet Commerce: A High-Stake Field Experiment on Data Regulation Policy (September 30, 2021). NET Institute Working Paper No. 21-10, Available at SSRN: https://ssrn.com/abstract=3962157 or http://dx.doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.3962157 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-value-of-personal-data-in-internet-commerce" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Inside the Wuhan lab weeks before Covid</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab-covid-pandemic-china-america-qhjwwwvm0</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T02:35:14.583151Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab-covid-pandemic-china-america-qhjwwwvm0"/>; <author>; <name>;ricksunny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ricksunny</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/%2Fmethode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F5aedcbf4-06ec-11ee-a1e5-6222cf71d60e.jpg?crop=1575%2C886%2C0%2C0&resize=360" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Scientists in Wuhan were allegedly conducting dangerous experiments combining deadly coronaviruses to create a new mutant virus with the Chinese military, which caused a leak from the Wuhan Institute of Virology and started the Covid-19 outbreak. The work was done in collaboration with researchers from the Chinese military, which was funding it and pursuing bioweapons. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inside-the-wuhan-lab-weeks-before-covid" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36276268" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;A Tradecraft Primer (2009)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cia.gov/resources/csi/books-monographs/a-tradecraft-primer/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T15:35:14.583640Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.cia.gov/resources/csi/books-monographs/a-tradecraft-primer/"/>; <author>; <name>;greenyouse</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greenyouse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;The article is a primer for CIA analysts to use analytic techniques to deal with the challenges of intelligence, including incomplete information and the complexity of international developments. It emphasizes the difficulty of understanding the intentions and capabilities of adversaries and the increased complexity of transnational threats involving multiple actors. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-tradecraft-primer-2009" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36281945" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WebObjects Overview (2001) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/LegacyTechnologies/WebObjects/WebObjects_5/WebObjectsOverview/WebObjectsOverview.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T14:35:14.584112Z</updated>; <link href="https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/LegacyTechnologies/WebObjects/WebObjects_5/WebObjectsOverview/WebObjectsOverview.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;kaladin-jasnah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaladin-jasnah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;The article is a disclaimer from Apple stating that they make no warranty or representation with respect to a manual, and that the purchaser assumes all risk as to its quality and accuracy. Apple will not be liable for any damages resulting from any defect or inaccuracy in the manual. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#webobjects-overview-2001-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36274647" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hacking the Philips Sonicare NFC Password</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/atc1441/status/1667252413051424773</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T15:35:14.584577Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/atc1441/status/1667252413051424773"/>; <author>; <name>;nmstoker</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nmstoker</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Something went wrong, but don't fret — let's give it another shot. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hacking-the-philips-sonicare-nfc-password" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36281807" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
